by_template.comment: Navmesh break between the transporter and the cockpit floor.
Navmesh break between the transporter and the cockpit floor.
Navmesh break between the transporter and the cockpit floor.
Navmesh break between the pilot chair and the rest of the cockpit.

param.name: boardingresistancebonuscombinedskill
param.comment: The ideal combined skill of a single defender unit used to fulfull the 'boardingresistancebonus'. A bonus lower than this results in a single low skilled unit.

param.name: skillshapes
param.value: table[ {0} = [formationshape.lineabreast, formationshape.lineastern, formationshape.circle, formationshape.halfcircle], {3} = [formationshape.vshape, formationshape.invvshape, formationshape.triangle], {6} = [formationshape.cross, formationshape.crossback, formationshape.crossforward, formationshape.xshape, formationshape.xshapeforward, formationshape.xshapeback], {9} = [formationshape.pointguard, formationshape.invpointguard], {12} = [formationshape.wshape, formationshape.eagle, formationshape.twin], {15} = [formationshape.vulcan, formationshape.dartvertical, formationshape.darthorizontal, formationshape.echelon] ]

param.name: max_npcs_per_pod
param.comment: Number of people that can be assigned to the same pod

param.name: max_pods
param.comment: Max number of pods to be launched from an object towards the same destination during bulk crew transfer, even if more people are transferred

param.name: max_pod_launch_delay
param.comment: Reasonable time in which max_pods are expected to be launched

param.name: travel_estimation_factor
param.comment: Factor for estimated travel time to improve chance that boarding pod arrives before timeout

param.name: max_travel_time
param.comment: Max pod travel duration (not including scheduled launch delay) after which the transferred crew is expected to arrive at destination

param.name: max_instanced_npcs
param.comment: Max number of NPCs per object instanced for transfer visualisation within $instanced_npc_timeframe

param.name: instanced_npc_timeframe
param.comment: Time after instantiation a NPC is counted towards the current total for that object

param.name: dismantling_station_processing_endtime_varname
param.comment: Blackboard variable name. Value is set to a gametime where the processor is safe to process a station dismantling build.

param.name: insufficientthreshold
param.comment: see attributes of generate_shortage_reports for documentation

param.name: insufficientthresholdcutoff
param.comment: see attributes of generate_shortage_reports for documentation

param.name: shortagethreshold
param.comment: see attributes of generate_shortage_reports for documentation

param.name: blocked_build_priority_time
param.comment: Time after which a blocked build is considered a priority build

param.name: loadout_reduction_time
param.comment: Time after which the loadout of a ship queued to be built is reduced to increase chances of starting construction

param.name: queued_build_abort_time_military
param.comment: Time after which builds for military ships are aborted if the resources to start construction are not available

param.name: queued_build_abort_time_civilian
param.comment: Time after which builds for civilian ships are aborted if the resources to start construction are not available

param.name: request_commandeerable_freighter_release_time
param.comment: Time after which the ship will be released

param.name: request_freighter_spawn_wait_time
param.comment: Time to allow the freighter to start being placed in a shipyard

param.name: request_freighter_build_wait_time
param.comment: Fallback time to allow the freighter to be built by the shipyard after spawning. Spawning usually only happens when all resources are present and building can start.

param.name: request_pri_freighter_spawn_wait_time
param.comment: Time to allow the freighter to start being placed in a shipyard

param.name: request_pri_freighter_build_wait_time
param.comment: Fallback time to allow the freighter to be built by the shipyard after spawning. Spawning usually only happens when all resources are present and building can start.

param.name: dismantle_station_timeout
param.comment: Time after which to consider dismantling a station if all productions are paused

param.name: pause_production_timeout
param.comment: Time to monitor a paused production

param.name: request_production_build_wait_time
param.comment: Time to allow the building to start

param.name: request_production_build_timeout
param.comment: Time to allow the build to progress before disregarding

param.name: request_production_working_timeout
param.comment: Time to allow the factory to work before disregarding

param.name: request_factory_build_wait_time
param.comment: Time to allow the building to start, where any module is operational or buildmodule is building

param.name: request_factory_build_timeout
param.comment: Time to allow the build to progress before disregarding

param.name: request_factory_working_timeout
param.comment: Time to allow the factory to work before disregarding

param.name: maxduration
param.comment: Maximum time a reservation is allowed to persist.
